stripped_text: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.
text: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
title: René "Loup" Arcemont: Party Animal

stripped_text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, you may gain 1 credit for each time you accessed a card during that run. Use this ability only once per turn.
text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, you may gain 1[credit] for each time you accessed a card during that run. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Zahya Sadeghi: Versatile Smuggler

flavor: Sufficient skill is indistinguishable from magic.
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may swap 2 installed pieces of ice.
text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may swap 2 installed pieces of ice.
title: Tāo Salonga: Telepresence Magician

flavor:
"With this beautiful baby I can juggle simultaneous runs by haptic feedback alone!"
—Tāo
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 1 credit. Then, you may install 1 card from your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 1[credit]. Then, you may install 1 card from your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Pantograph

flavor:
"We'll take the access codes from their own prisec—privilege escalation through local application of force."
—The Catalyst
stripped_text: Run HQ or R&D. If successful, draw 1 card. When you breach the attacked server, access 1 additional card.
text: Run HQ or R&D. If successful, draw 1 card. When you breach the attacked server, access 1 additional card.
title: Jailbreak

flavor: "After 381FS4 started acting independently, all bets were off. Rethreading its own brain chip… even probing our nodes. I had to shut it down." —Linus Lovegood, NBN Novelties&Acquisitions
stripped_text: Place 5 credits on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
text: Place 5[credit] on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
title: Overclock

stripped_text: You get +1 maximum hand size. Whenever you score an agenda, you may add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text:
You get +1 maximum hand size.
Whenever you score an agenda, you may add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
title: Haas-Bioroid: Precision Design

stripped_text: When your discard phase ends, if there is a facedown card in Archives, gain 1 credit.
text: When your discard phase ends, if there is a facedown card in Archives, gain 1[credit].
title: Jinteki: Restoring Humanity

flavor: Macroscale developments within the Net decouple the prior informational states—surplus entropy is then gifted where it will do the most good.
stripped_text: Do X net damage, where X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on agendas you scored this turn.
text: Do X net damage, where X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on agendas you scored this turn.
title: Neurospike

flavor:
The self-evolving Net twists into spaces unthought and unthinkable: realms of gods and other infohazards, mocking our sacrifices to petty causality.
—Conceptual Frameworks for Applied Theology
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may pay 2 credits and trash 2 cards from HQ. If you do, end the run.
text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may pay 2[credit] and trash 2 cards from HQ. If you do, end the run.
title: Anoetic Void

stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner takes a tag, gain 2 credits or draw 2 cards.
text: The first time each turn the Runner takes a tag, gain 2[credit] or draw 2 cards.
title: NBN: Reality Plus

flavor: "A runner uses significant resources scrubbing their traces. Every cycle, it's harder to pin them down. But the game changes. In Heinlein, no one can last a day without brushing our AR-network." —Cassie LaRosa, Lunar NetDefense Sysop
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 8 credits.
text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 8[credit].
title: Public Trail

stripped_text: Whenever you advance a card, gain 2 credits if it had no advancement counters.
text: Whenever you advance a card, gain 2[credit] if it had no advancement counters.
title: Weyland Consortium: Built to Last
